long_description: The Suunto M-3 Global Pro compass provides the serious outdoor enthusiast with accurate and reliable navigation in both the northern and southern hemispheres. Adjustable declination accounts for difference between true and magnetic north. 2-zone geographical balancing system allows you to easily use compass in the northern and southern hemispheres. Luminous, 2-color bezel ring, silicon map grippers on base, and meridian lines help orient compass to map. Includes a neck lanyard and operating instructions.
short_description: The Suunto M-3 Global Pro compass provides the serious outdoor enthusiast with accurate and reliable navigation in both the northern and southern hemispheres.
